overview: Dolores Del Rio plays 18th-century French courtesan Madame du Barry like a 20th-century golddigger on the make. Brought to Versailles as the companion of courtier D'Aigullon (Victor Jory), the former street waif charms her way into the heart -- and boudoir -- of gouty King Louis XV (Reginald Owen).
title: Madame du Barry
